音檔來源：https://ttsmaker.com/zh-hk


```java
import java.io.*;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Path;
import java.nio.file.Paths;
import java.util.Base64;

public class MP3ToBase64Converter {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
////        mp3 to base64
//        String directoryPath = "D:\\mp3\\";
//        String outputPath = "D:\\mp3\\result.txt";
//        convertMp3FilesToBase64(directoryPath, outputPath);

//        base64 to file
        decodeBase64(""
        , "0"
        );
    }

    public static void convertMp3FilesToBase64(String directoryPath, String outputPath) {
        File folder = new File(directoryPath);
        File[] files = folder.listFiles((dir, name) -> name.toLowerCase().endsWith(".mp3"));
        StringBuilder base64StringBuilder = new StringBuilder();

        if (files != null && files.length > 0) {
            for (File file : files) {
                try {
                    // 讀取 MP3 檔案為 byte[]
                    byte[] mp3Data = Files.readAllBytes(file.toPath());

                    // 轉換為 Base64 字串
                    String base64Audio = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(mp3Data);

                    // 添加檔案名稱與其 Base64 字串
                    base64StringBuilder.append("File: ").append(file.getName()).append("\n");
                    base64StringBuilder.append(base64Audio).append("\n\n");
                } catch (IOException e) {
                    System.err.println("Error reading file: " + file.getName());
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }

            // 將 Base64 字串寫入結果文件
            try (FileWriter fileWriter = new FileWriter(outputPath)) {
                fileWriter.write(base64StringBuilder.toString());
                System.out.println("Base64 strings have been written to: " + outputPath);
            } catch (IOException e) {
                System.err.println("Error writing to result file.");
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        } else {
            System.out.println("No MP3 files found in the specified directory.");
        }
    }
    private static void decodeBase64(String base64String,String fileName){
        // 解碼 Base64 字串
        byte[] decodedBytes = Base64.getDecoder().decode(base64String);

        // 將解碼後的 byte 陣列寫入到檔案
        String outputFilePath = "D:\\mp3\\haha\\" + fileName + ".mp3"; // 輸出的檔案名稱
        try (FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(new File(outputFilePath))) {
            fos.write(decodedBytes);
            System.out.println("解碼並寫入檔案成功：" + outputFilePath);
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}
